pages.text: In a field of sleepy daisies, lived a little firefly named Luna. While other fireflies danced with bright, bold lights, Luna was afraid of the dark, so she kept her own light very, very small.
One night, a wise old owl with spectacles on his beak hooted gently. 'Little one,' he said, 'the night is not empty. It's a treasure map! Shine your light, and you will see the patterns.'

pages.description: Help Luna connect the stars to reveal the magical shapes in the sky!

pages.text: As Luna connected the stars, a Great Bear appeared, twinkling back at her! The sky wasn't scary at all; it was full of friends. From that night on, Luna's light was the brightest in the whole field.
